page.title: 19CARAVANS
page.content: THE COMING OF THE M5 MOTORWAY WITH THE OPENING OF THE FUNCTION 22 AT EDITHMEAD BROUGHT AN INCREASE IN THE NUMBER OF TOURING CARAVANS COMMING TO THIS AREA AND AN INCREASE IN THE DEMAND FOR PERMANENT SITES FOR STATIC CARAVANS. IN THIS BLOCK THERE ARE NOW TWENTY THREE SITES FOR STATIC CARAVANS. THESE SITES VARY IN SIZE FROM TEN TO SIXTY CARAVANS.BY LAW THEY HAVE WATER WATER SUPPLIES AND TOILETS,BUT SOME HAVE NOTHING MORE.THE ADVANTAGES TO THE HOLIDAY PEOPLE ARE THAT CARAVANS CAN BE LET TO PROVIDE AN INCOME OR CAN BE USED,WHEN CONVEINIENT,BY THE OWNER. TOURING CARAVANS ARE USUALLY PLACED IN EMPTY SITES OR ON FIELDS WHICH HAVE LIMETED PERMITS.
